item.title: IPO: Interpretable Prompt Optimization for Vision-Language Models
item.description: This paper introduces IPO, a novel interpretable prompt optimizer for vision-language models. IPO uses large language models (LLMs) to dynamically generate human-understandable prompts, improving acc…
